Questions App¶

The Questions App provides handling for question management. This includes:
  • Maintaining Questions in the Master Question table
  • Cloning Master Questions into the Audit Question table
  • Question review workflow

Models¶

Models for Questions App

Question Models are inherited from a common abstract base class. From this common base, questions may exist in one or more different derived question models:

QuestionMaster Model: Contains the master approved question pool

QuestionAudit Model: Contains Questions that exist on individual audits.

QuestionsReview Model: Contains Questions that have been submitted for entry to the Approved Question pool (i.e., the QuestionMaster model) - but are not yet approved.

class iadb2.questions.models.QuestionAbstract(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Question - Abstract Base Class

Attributes:

class iadb2.questions.models.QuestionMaster(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Question - Master Question Object

A Master Question is one from which audit questions are cloned. An audit will clone (copy) questions out of the Master Question pool (this table). Once the question has been cloned, the master and the clone are independent of each other. This allows the master question to be revised, deleted, etc - without impacting the question as it exists on the audit.

q_status¶

CharField – Status Code for question.

q_version¶

PositiveIntegerField – Version number for this question. The version number should be increased on every major revision.

q_has_alternates¶

BooleanField – Has alternate versions. Alternate versions all track the parent. This field advises that the question as spawned alternates.

q_alt_parent¶

ForeignKey – ID of parent derived from if this is an alternate question.
